pr_title: Template Based Query Generation: Query generation (Merge Fix)

timeline.message: brought up to date with Victor's progress---it works

timeline.bodyText: Please fix the indentation of this file to use 2 space of tab
timeline.author: Bei-z

timeline.bodyText: As discussed offline, please consider generalize this file to easier adding configs for other dialects.
timeline.author: Bei-z

timeline.bodyText:
Java has it's own pair class. Any reason to create another pair class here?
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/javafx/api/javafx/util/Pair.html
timeline.author: Bei-z

replies.bodyText: For some reason, Intellij + maven is giving me difficulties with javafx (this was why I decided to do it myself originally). I have deleted the class and used import internal.net.http.common.Pair instead
replies.author: AllenWang314

replies.bodyText: So turns out that package isn't that great to work with either. This one was the one that worked in the end: org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.MutablePair
replies.author: AllenWang314

timeline.message: made edits to correct queries, added pair class correctly
